00012         class SingularLicense extends License
00013         {               
00017                 const SINGLE_USER_LICENSE = 0;
00018 
00022                 const FAMILYPACK_LICENSE = 1;
00023 
00027                 const SITE_LICENSE = 2;
00028                 
00032                 const DEFAULT_LICENSE_DURATION = 31536000;
00033                 
00038                 public function SingularLicense($name = '', $email = '', $key = '')
00039                 {
00040                         $this->username = $name;
00041                         $this->email = $email;
00042                         $this->key = $key;
00043                         
00044                         $this->init();
00045                 }

00051                 protected function init()
00052                 {
00053                         if (self::valid_key($this->key,
00054                                 $this->username,
00055                                 $cleartext))
00056                         {
00057                                 $cleartext_parts = explode(';', $cleartext);
00058                                 $this->registration_date = strtotime($cleartext_parts[1]);
00059                                 $this->expiration_date = strtotime($cleartext_parts[2]);
00060                                 $this->license_type = $cleartext_parts[3];
00061                         }
00062                 }
00063                 
00069                 public static function parse_url($the_url)
00070                 {
00071                         $license = NULL;
00072                         $parts = explode('/', $the_url);
00073                         if (count($parts) == 6)
00074                         {
00075                                 $email = rawurldecode($parts[3]);
00076                                 $username = rawurldecode($parts[4]);
00077                                 $key = rawurldecode($parts[5]);
00078                                 
00079                                 $license = new self($username,
00080                                         $email,
00081                                         $key);
00082                         }
00083                         return $license;
00084                 }
00085                 
00090                 public static function generate_key($username,
00091                         $registration_date = NULL,
00092                         $expiration_date = NULL,
00093                         $license_type = SingularLicense::SINGLE_USER_LICENSE)
00094                 {
00095                         $key = NULL;
00096                         
00097                         // Convert from ISO-8859-1 to UTF-8
00098                         $username = iconv("iso-8859-1", "utf-8", $username);
00099                         // Calculate SHA-1 hash
00100                         $hash = sha1($username);
00101                         // License start date
00102                         if (empty($registration_date))
00103                         {
00104                                 $registration_date = date("Y-m-d");
00105                         }
00106                         // License expiration date
00107                         if (empty($expiration_date))
00108                         {
00109                                 $expiration_date = date("Y-m-d", time() + SingularLicense::DEFAULT_LICENSE_DURATION);
00110                         }
00111                         // Digest to cypher
00112                         $digest = "{$hash};{$registration_date};{$expiration_date};{$license_type}";
00113 
00114                         $priv_key_path = dirname(__FILE__) . "/../openssl/singular_private_key.pem";
00115                         
00116                         if (file_exists($priv_key_path))
00117                         {
00118                                 $fp = fopen($priv_key_path,"r");
00119                                 $priv_key = fread($fp, filesize($priv_key_path));
00120                                 fclose($fp);
00121                                 // $passphrase is required if your key is encoded (suggested)
00122                                 $passphrase = '';
00123                                 if (($res = openssl_get_privatekey($priv_key, $passphrase)) !== FALSE)
00124                                 {
00125                                         /*
00126                                          * NOTE:  Here you use the returned resource value
00127                                          */
00128                                         openssl_private_encrypt($digest, $crypttext, $res);
00129                                         // Calculate the key
00130                                         $key = Base64::encode_linelength($crypttext, 32);
00131                                 }
00132                         }
00133                         return $key;
00134                 }
00135                 
00140                 public static function valid_key($key,
00141                         $username = '',
00142                         &$cleartext = NULL)
00143                 {
00144                         $valid = FALSE;
00145                         
00146                         if (strlen($key) > 0 &&
00147                                 strlen($username) > 0)
00148                         {
00149                                 // Convert from ISO-8859-1 to UTF-8
00150                                 $username = iconv("iso-8859-1", "utf-8", $username);
00151                                 // Calculate SHA-1 hash
00152                                 $hash = sha1($username);
00153                                 // 
00154                                 $raw_key = Base64::decode($key);
00155         
00156                                 $pub_key_path = dirname(__FILE__) . "/../openssl/singular_public_key.pem";
00157                                 
00158                                 if (file_exists($pub_key_path))
00159                                 {
00160                                         $fp = fopen($pub_key_path, "r");
00161                                         $pub_key = fread($fp, filesize($pub_key_path));
00162                                         fclose($fp);
00163                                         if (($res = openssl_get_publickey($pub_key)) !== FALSE)
00164                                         {
00165                                                 /*
00166                                                  * NOTE:  Here you use the returned resource value
00167                                                  */
00168                                                 openssl_public_decrypt($raw_key, $cleartext, $res);
00169                                                 
00170                                                 $cleartext_parts = explode(';', $cleartext);
00171                                                 $valid = $cleartext_parts[0] == $hash;
00172                                         }
00173                                 }
00174                         }
00175                         return $valid;
00176                 }

00183                 public function activation_link($text = NULL)
00184                 {
00185                         if (empty($text))
00186                         {
00187                                 $text = l('Click here to activate Singular');
00188                         }
00189                         return a($text, array('href' => $this->activation_url()));

00191                 
00196                 public function activation_url()
00197                 {
00198                         return sprintf('singular://register/%s/%s/%s',
00199                                 rawurlencode($this->email),
00200                                 rawurlencode($this->username),
00201                                 rawurlencode($this->key));
